title: "Machine learning and knowledge engineering uncovers significant role of elevated blood glucose in severe Covid-19"
excerpt: "Why does COVID-19 present itself more severe in some patients but not in others? The question has puzzled researchers and clinicians since the start of the pandemic, but now new research from the EPFL Blue Brain Project may have found a major clue to solving the mystery thanks to machine learning."
